bio: I am a person motivated by challenging goals and being fully accountable for results. I am fascinated how business and technology meet together. Understanding of business issues significantly helps me in better alignment of IT solutions with company's vision and strategy. Combination of creative and analytical thinking helps me to find an effective solution in even very difficult situations. I believe that people are the biggest asset in IT industry and growing engaged, skilled and empowered teams is the best investment of the company.
